content.d: Mia, what are you up to?
Whoa! Ka-Karin, you startled me. Don’t scare me like that.
Did I really startle you that much......? Oh, Hanpen is here too.
Huh? It’s not like I’m a little kid, so I have no reason to do that. I was just petting her.
Really? I could have sworn I heard a cute voice.
Fufu, you can’t hide from Karin-senpai.
